I donâ€™t think this properly addresses #1060. Consider this:

With two tabbed containers on a workspace, both having 5 windows. Focus in the right tabbed container one is on the right-most window. Focus in the left tabbed container is on the right-most window.

When moving that window to the right, with your patch, it will be inserted before the fifth window, but #1060 talks about it being inserted before the first window.
